version_description:
A (BERRY) BLAST FROM THE PAST! We've added new game modes:

- CLASSIC MODE! Watch out for bombs and don't miss any fruit with the original fruit slicing experience

- ZEN MODE! Sit back, relax, and be one with the fruit in this iconic mode.

- Various bug fixes
Patch fix for some users that were not receiving rewards when completing events

* New loading screen!
* New landing screen background!
* New menu music & ambience audio!
* Improvements to Koya's Wanderer and Smile Hood skins!
* Daily Deals now have a countdown timer AND you can see the next reward that you'll receive!
* Additional functionality put in place for future event and economy changes!
* Bug fixes!

* New translations available - change your language in the Settings menu in-game!

* New 3D Garden!
* Ever wondered what your character sounds like?  Wonder no more - all characters have new audio!
* New voiceover audio for your blitzes in-game!
* Several bug fixes but one in particular for Mayhem mode where arena shrinks

Please note - we are working on improving the available translations and will have these improvements out as soon as possible.

* Leagues Season Two is now active!

Fixes for:
* Bug when claiming leaderboard rewards
* Shop showing incorrect localisation text
* Mayhem now playing correct soundtrack

Patch fix to address crashes with:
* Some PVP modes
* Interstitial and rewarded ads

•	If you make a purchase in game with real money, you will no longer see ads after playing a game
•	Fixes to leaderboards not giving rewards and changing scores
•	Multiple fixes to Minigame Shuffle event
•	Disappearing sales and offers in the Shop should now stay put until they expire
•	Great Wave will now be automatically added to your Armory when achieving the score requirement in Arcade mode
•	Fixes to bugs around blade shards not being applied to blades and those shards being lost
•	Fixed up inconsistencies around receiving rewards after watching ads
•	Want to know who worked on Fruit Ninja 2?  We now have credits in the Settings menu!
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

Patch fix to address bugs:
* Crashes related to Quest system not providing enough quests
* Daily Quest screen showing white squares where quests should be
* Players losing blade shards when trying to allocate from rewards in the Garden
* Other small UI bugs
* Back end improvements for crash and ad analysis

- Improved cheat security
- Improved leaderboard stability
- Changed up reward distribution for quests
- Added more quest types
- Changes to the scheduling of event modes
- Various bug fixes and UI tweaks

- Adjusted XP curve and increased maximum level to 120
- You can now watch an ad to reduce the time to wait for a box in the garden to ripen
- Leagues now last 45 days instead of 90
- Numerous bug fixes and improvements
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

Here is what is new for v2.2.0:
* Season Pass for Season Two is about to unlock with:
	- New characters and blades
	- New seasonal quests
* New loading screen
* New main menu background
* New arenas and visual updates to existing arenas
* Wavelists now randomised between arenas
* Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

What's new in v2.3.0?
* Improvements made to PVP match making
* New inbox feature
* Bug fixes

* Improved menus for VS Friend mode
* Visual updates to the Season Pass purchase pop up
* New Fruitar Hero track - 'Fruit Killa'
* Bug fixes

* Changes to the way that blades are displayed in the Armory
* Increase rarities associated with some characters and skins
* Implementation of Turkish language in-game
* New Fruitar Hero track - Corta La Fruta
* Bug fixes

* Special Timed Event - earn coins while playing PVP!
* Coins now given out instead of gems where Season Pass has been completed
* Changes made to Arcade Rumble event and rewards
* Bug fixes

* Season Pass 3 implemented and ready for launch
* New Fruitar Hero track - Journey by Tokyo Machine
* Bug fixes

* Season Pass 3 implemented and ready for launch
* New Fruitar Hero track - Journey by Tokyo Machine
* Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

* New players to have the chance to participate in an event we are working on!
* Bug fixes

* Season 4 is ready to go and coming soon!
* Bug fixes

* New players to have the chance to participate in an event we are working on!
* Bug fixes.

* New Halloween skins for Koya and Kumi!
* Bug fixes

* New Halloween skins for Koya and Kumi!
* Bug fixes

* Season 5 is ready to go!
* Bug fixes

* Season 6 - Year of the Tiger - is almost here!
* Lunar New Year themed skins for Koya and Kumi!
* Watch ads for more tickets or extra lives in Minigame Shuffle!
- Bug fixes

* More bananas, more bombs - welcome to Arcade Plus!
* Bug fixes - including a fix for broken ads
* Bug fixes
